remark.p: Deputy Director, Office of Special Political Affairs, Department of State (to March 18); Director, Office of Special Political Affairs, Department of State (from March 19).

Special Assistant to the Director, Office of Special Political Affairs, Department of State, May–October 1944; Deputy Director, Office of Special Political Affairs, Department of State, November 1944–March 1945; Director, Office of Special Political Affairs, Department of State, March 1945–January 1947.
Director, Office of Special Political Affairs (Deputy Director, November 1944 to March 1945); Secretary-General, International Secretariat.
